sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import '../scss/main.scss';
import RevSlider, { Slide, Caption } from 'react-rev-slider';


const SectionSlider = () => {

    const config = {
        delay:9000,
        startwidth:1170,
        startheight:500,
        hideThumbs:10,
        fullWidth:"on",
        forceFullWidth:"on"
    };

    return (
        <RevSlider config={config}>
            <Slide
                src="https://i.ytimg.com/vi/dFnvYtPePRA/maxresdefault.jpg"
                alt="slidebg1"
                data-bgfit="cover"
                data-bgposition="left top"
                data-bgrepeat="no-repeat"
                slideProperties={{
                    'data-transition': "fade",
                    'data-slotamount': "7",
                    'data-masterspeed': "1500"
                }}
            >
                <Caption
                    class="tp-caption skewfromrightshort fadeout"
                    data-x="85"
                    data-y="224"
                    data-speed="500"
                    data-start="1200"
                    data-easing="Power4.easeOut"
                >
                    This is a caption
                </Caption>
            </Slide>
            <Slide
                src="https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0xe4H666drk/maxresdefault.jpg"
                alt="slidebg1"
                data-bgfit="cover"
                data-bgposition="left top"
                data-bgrepeat="no-repeat"
                slideProperties={{
                    'data-transition': "fade",
                    'data-slotamount': "7",
                    'data-masterspeed': "1500"
                }}
            >
                <Caption
                    class="tp-caption skewfromrightshort fadeout"
                    data-x="85"
                    data-y="224"
                    data-speed="500"
                    data-start="1200"
                    data-easing="Power4.easeOut"
                >
                    This is a caption
                </Caption>
            </Slide>
        </RevSlider>
    )
}

export default SectionSlider
